metadata.title: CVE-2016-10542 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: ws is a "simple to use, blazing fast and thoroughly tested websocketclient, server and console for node.js, up-to-date against RFC-6455". Bysending an overly long websocket payload to a `ws` server, it is possibleto crash the node process. This affects ws 1.1.0 and earlier.

criterions.comment: node-ws: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
